summary: A bank manager is blackmailed into robbing his own bank.
cast: Kô Nishimura|Nobuo Kaneko|Mari Shiraki|Jun Hamamura|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Yôko Kosono|Zenji Yamada|Tomio Aoki|Reiko Arai|Norikatsu Hanamura|Nobuo Kawakami|Shôji Kawamura|Kenji Kawatani|Toshizô Kudô|Kaneyuki Mizutani|Chiyoko Shimizu|Daisei Yamanaka
title: Aru kyôhaku
